The phone will be supported by the carrier [[NTT DoCoMo]] in Japan, where the variant sold there will be officially known as the [[:ja:SC-04D|SC-04D]] within the [[:ja:docomo NEXT series|docomo NEXT series]] of smartphone devices.
The phone will be supported by the carrier [[NTT DoCoMo]] in Japan, where the variant sold there will be officially known as the [[:ja:SC-04D|SC-04D]] within the [[:ja:docomo NEXT series|docomo NEXT series]] of smartphone devices.

In the UK, the Galaxy Nexus will be available on [[Vodafone (UK)|Vodafone]], [[O2 (UK)|O2]], and [[Hutchison 3G|Three]] on November 17, 2011 at a price of Â£549.99. The version sold will be the [[Evolved HSPA|HSPA+]] version. <ref>http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/27/amazon-outs-galaxy-nexus-release-date-available-in-the-uk-on-no/</ref> Only the 16GB version of the phone will be available in the UK. <ref>http://blog.three.co.uk/2011/10/19/galaxy-nexus-is-coming-to-three/</ref> <ref>http://blog.clove.co.uk/2011/10/19/samsung-galaxy-nexus-16gb-available-to-pre-order-at-clove-429-vat/</ref> Clove Technology have announced the 32GB model of the Galaxy Nexus will not be available in the United Kingdom. [[Amazon]] have listed the handset for Â£549.99. <ref>http://www.galaxynexus.org/buy-galaxy-nexus/</ref>
+
In the UK, the Galaxy Nexus will be available on [[Vodafone (UK)|Vodafone]], [[O2 (UK)|O2]], and [[Hutchison 3G|Three]] on November 17, 2011 at a price of Â£549.99. The version sold will be the [[Evolved HSPA|HSPA+]] version. <ref>http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/27/amazon-outs-galaxy-nexus-release-date-available-in-the-uk-on-no/</ref> Only the 16GB version of the phone will be available in the UK. <ref>http://blog.three.co.uk/2011/10/19/galaxy-nexus-is-coming-to-three/</ref> <ref>http://blog.clove.co.uk/2011/10/19/samsung-galaxy-nexus-16gb-available-to-pre-order-at-clove-429-vat/</ref> Clove Technology have announced the 32GB model of the Galaxy Nexus will not be available in the United Kingdom. [[Amazon]] have listed the handset for Â£549.99. <ref>http://www.amazon.co.uk/Samsung-I9250-Galaxy-Nexus-Mobile/dp/B005XYU45E</ref>
The phone is expected to launch in 20 other European countries on November 17, 2011.<ref>http://nexus404.com/Blog/2011/10/28/european-galaxy-nexus-release-date-partners-revealed-plenty-of-european-carriers-to-launch-the-samsung-google-nexus-android-ice-cream-sandwich-smartphone-%e2%80%93-here%e2%80%99s-where-to-buy-it/</ref>
The phone is expected to launch in 20 other European countries on November 17, 2011.<ref>http://nexus404.com/Blog/2011/10/28/european-galaxy-nexus-release-date-partners-revealed-plenty-of-european-carriers-to-launch-the-samsung-google-nexus-android-ice-cream-sandwich-smartphone-%e2%80%93-here%e2%80%99s-where-to-buy-it/</ref>
